channel.title: How can i add a little menu to my client?
channel.description: i got a client, and i want to make a mine for it with only one task: " Music " it gots the folder: User/Music and i put music and i want to make a Music task, and it needs to show: Stop,Pause Play and Next. Tyvm :Dv :) :)
